summary: This document consists of internal communications regarding alerts related to a civil racketeering lawsuit and a sexual abuse suit involving Mr. Epstein. The communications confirm that a beneficiary of a trust associated with Epstein has been cleared of any wrongdoing and is not opening an account. The document highlights the compliance review process for alerts related to Epstein.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in the review of alerts related to a civil racketeering lawsuit and a sexual abuse suit involving Epstein. She confirms that the beneficiary of the trust is cleared of any wrongdoing.

persons.name: Monifa Crawford
persons.context: Monifa Crawford communicates about the alerts and the compliance review process, confirming the status of the beneficiary in relation to the trust.

persons.name: Mr. Epstein
persons.context: Mr. Epstein is mentioned in relation to a sexual abuse suit and a civil racketeering lawsuit. He pleaded guilty to soliciting prostitution and served time in jail.

persons.name: Ms.
persons.context: Ms. is referenced as a beneficiary of a trust where Epstein is the grantor. She is noted to have been cleared of any charges related to the lawsuits.

connections.description: Mr. Epstein is the grantor of the trust where Ms. is a beneficiary.
Amanda Kirby and Monifa Crawford are both AML Compliance Officers working together on the review of alerts.

events.title: Sexual Abuse Suit
events.description: A suit was filed alleging that Mr. Epstein sexually abused underage girls, which was later dropped.

events.title: AML Compliance Clearance
events.description: AML Compliance issued a clearance applicable for the alerts related to Ms.

keyFacts: Ms. was cleared of all charges related to the civil racketeering lawsuit.
The sexual abuse suit against Mr. Epstein was dropped, and he pleaded guilty to soliciting prostitution.
Ms. is a beneficiary of a trust where Mr. Epstein is the grantor, but she is not opening an account and has no authority on the trust account.
The alerts being reviewed are from 2008 and had already been cleared in previous compliance checks.
There are multiple internal communications regarding the compliance review process for alerts related to Epstein.
